channel.title: Minor Planet Center on Parsecs Reach
channel.description: Recent content in Minor Planet Center on Parsecs Reach

item.title: Spark and the Minor Planet Center data
item.description: Introduction A few weeks ago I saw comments between @Sondy and @JLGalache talking about getting a list of asteroids with their date of discovery. The main data file lists the year of discovery but not the actual date. I thought there was a way to get this information by looking at the observation file and joining it to the main data file. Todo this I decided to use Apache Spark.
